short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group the tabs of your visiting sites with auto keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Group the tabs of your visiting sites with auto keywords. You can insert, move, remove, open tab items within a group or between groups and also can do the same tasks with tab groups. tabs can be shown divided by column count up to 5. It will be helpful for your productivity which means you can save useful websites in ShimTab and arrange tab items into a group for your view.

v1.0.11: first version
v1.1.1 : change UI, add Open&Remove to subMenu and remove OpenNew&Remove which is not frequently used, add progress bar for lagging rendering notice
v1.1.3 : change command key from Ctrl+B to Ctrl+Shift+S, fix for handling some malformed URIs of websites, add version beside title
v1.1.5, v1.1.6: quick fix for no matched title
v1.1.9, v1.1.10: quick fix for group merge
v1.1.11: replace percentage to msec to speed up loading from DB. add openNew&Remove in settings of a group. remove col-divide menu since not so useful. modify padding values of item line.
v1.1.12: bug fix for regex of "chrome://" and "chrome-extension://". strangely permission issue occurs even if manifest is not changed. So adding catch sentence and smoothly resolve it not rejecting...
v1.1.15: bug fix for add present tab in context menu in case that no shimtab is available in window. And change the color of textarea in options.

v1.1.16: applied IntersectionObserver to fix slow loading issue

v1.1.17:
  - add clearDB in option
  - list groups by descending to ascending order in date when using ApplyToDB
  - now it shows fastest loading among all tab programs
long.ko:
Group the tabs of your visiting sites with auto keywords.
You can insert, move, remove, open tab items and also can do the same with tab groups. For your productivity, tabs can be shown divided by column count.

v1.0.11, v1.0.14: first version
v1.1.1, v1.1.2: change UI, add Open&Remove to subMenu and remove OpenNew&Remove which is not frequently used, add progress bar for lagging rendering notice
v1.1.3, v1.1.4: change command key from Ctrl+B to Ctrl+Shift+S, fix for handling some malformed URIs of websites, add version beside title
v1.1.5, v1.1.6: quick fix for no matched title
v1.1.9, v1.1.10: fix for group merge
v1.1.11: replace percentage to msec to speed up loading from DB. add openNew&Remove in settings of a group. remove col-divide menu since not so useful. modify padding values of item line.
v1.1.12: bug fix for regex of "chrome://" and "chrome-extension://". strangely permission issue occurs even if manifest is not changed. So adding catch sentence and smoothly resolve it not rejecting...
v1.1.15: bug fix for add present tab in context menu in case that no shimtab is available in window. And change the color of textarea in options.

v1.1.16: applied IntersectionObserver to fix slow loading issue

v1.1.17:
  - add clearDB in option
  - list groups by descending to ascending order in date when using ApplyToDB
  - now it shows fastest loading among all tab programs
